testCases.name: Functional Application Test
testCases.description: Verify the application has actual functionality beyond basic placeholder
steps: Navigate to application homepage
Verify multiple interactive elements exist (navigation menu, buttons, image gallery)
Check for proper navigation structure with links to Explore, Featured, Login/Signup
Verify application shows real image showcase functionality, not just placeholder content
Confirm responsive design elements are present
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application shows functional image showcase features with navigation, gallery display, and interactive elements
testCases.failureCondition: If page only shows 'Vite + React' placeholder or basic template content, this test should FAIL

testCases.name: Navigation Functionality Test
testCases.description: Test that navigation menu and routing work correctly
steps: Check top navigation bar is visible and fixed
Click on 'Explore' link and verify it navigates to explore page
Click on 'Featured' link and verify it navigates to featured galleries
Click on logo and verify it returns to homepage
Test responsive navigation on mobile viewport
testCases.expectedOutcome: All navigation links work correctly and pages load without errors

testCases.name: User Authentication Flow Test
testCases.description: Test complete user registration and login functionality
steps: Navigate to login/signup page via 'Log In' or 'Sign Up' links
Test registration form with valid email, username, and password
Verify form validation for required fields
Test login form with registered credentials
Verify authentication state changes (navigation menu updates)
Test logout functionality
testCases.expectedOutcome: Users can successfully register, login, and logout with proper state management

testCases.name: Image Gallery Display Test
testCases.description: Verify image gallery displays and functions correctly
steps: Navigate to homepage and check for image showcase grid
Verify images load with proper titles and descriptions
Test 'View Image' links navigate to detailed image view
Check responsive grid layout on different screen sizes
Verify loading states and error handling for failed image loads
testCases.expectedOutcome: Image gallery displays properly with functional links and responsive design

testCases.name: Image Upload Functionality Test
testCases.description: Test image upload feature for authenticated users
steps: Login as authenticated user
Navigate to upload page via 'Upload' link in navigation
Test file selection with valid image formats (PNG, JPEG)
Fill in required metadata (title, description, tags)
Submit upload form and verify success message
Check that uploaded image appears in gallery
testCases.expectedOutcome: Authenticated users can successfully upload images with metadata

testCases.name: Search and Filter Test
steps: Navigate to explore page
Test search functionality with various keywords
Verify search results display relevant images
Test category filtering if available
Check sorting options (by date, popularity, etc.)
Verify empty search results are handled gracefully
testCases.expectedOutcome: Search and filtering work correctly with appropriate results and error handling

testCases.name: User Profile Functionality Test
testCases.description: Test user profile viewing and management
steps: Login as authenticated user
Navigate to user profile via dropdown menu
Verify profile information displays correctly
Test dashboard functionality if available
Check user's uploaded images are displayed
Test profile editing capabilities if present
testCases.expectedOutcome: User profiles display correctly with proper information and functionality

testCases.name: Social Interaction Features Test
testCases.description: Test social features like likes, comments, and follows
steps: Login as authenticated user
Navigate to an image detail page
Test like functionality on images
Test commenting on images
Test following other users if feature is available
Verify social interactions update in real-time
testCases.expectedOutcome: Social features work correctly with proper feedback and real-time updates

testCases.name: Notifications System Test
steps: Login as authenticated user
Navigate to notifications page
Verify notifications display correctly
Test real-time notification updates
Check notification marking as read functionality
Verify notification types (likes, comments, follows)
testCases.expectedOutcome: Notification system works with real-time updates and proper state management

testCases.name: Responsive Design Test
testCases.description: Test application responsiveness across different devices
steps: Test application on desktop viewport (1920x1080)
Test on tablet viewport (768x1024)
Test on mobile viewport (375x667)
Verify navigation menu adapts to smaller screens
Check image gallery grid responsiveness
Test form layouts on mobile devices
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application displays correctly and remains functional across all device sizes

testCases.name: Error Handling and Edge Cases Test
testCases.description: Test application behavior with errors and edge cases
steps: Test with invalid login credentials
Test form submission with missing required fields
Test file upload with invalid file types
Test navigation to non-existent pages (404 handling)
Test behavior when API is unavailable
Test with slow network conditions
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application handles errors gracefully with appropriate user feedback

testCases.name: Application Performance Test
testCases.description: Test application loading speed and performance
steps: Measure initial page load time
Test image loading performance in gallery
Check for memory leaks during navigation
Test application with large number of images
Verify lazy loading implementation if present
Check bundle size and optimization
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application loads quickly and performs well under normal usage conditions

testCases.name: Accessibility Compliance Test
steps: Test keyboard navigation throughout the application
Verify proper ARIA labels and roles are present
Test with screen reader compatibility
Check color contrast ratios meet WCAG standards
Verify form labels and error messages are accessible
Test focus management and visual indicators
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application meets basic accessibility standards and is usable with assistive technologies

testCases.name: Basic Security Test
testCases.description: Test basic security measures and authentication
steps: Verify protected routes require authentication
Test that unauthenticated users cannot access upload functionality
Check that user sessions persist correctly
Verify logout clears authentication state
Test that users can only modify their own content
Check for proper input validation and sanitization
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application properly protects authenticated routes and user data

testCases.name: Data Persistence Test
testCases.description: Test that user data and application state persist correctly
steps: Login and perform various actions (upload, like, comment)
Refresh the browser and verify authentication state persists
Check that uploaded images remain visible after refresh
Verify user preferences and settings are maintained
Test data consistency across different browser sessions
Check that logout properly clears persisted data
testCases.expectedOutcome: User data and application state persist correctly across sessions
